title: Cannot synchronize a .java file and another resource
OB: When attempting to synchronize a .java file and another resource, an error occurs and synchronization fails.
EB: Synchronization should be successful when trying to synchronize a .java file and another resource.
SR: 1. Open the synchronization feature. 2. Select a .java file and another resource to synchronize. 3. Click on the synchronize button. 4. Observe the error and failed synchronization.
